text:
I am running our monthly analytics reports and while I know there will be slight discrepancies between HubSpot and Google what I am finding is a much larger difference:

HubSpot Sessions: 4,549
Gooogle Sessions: 1,342

HubSpot Bounce Rate: 78.24%
Google Bounce Rate 48.58%

What causes this difference and how do I fix it?
what's better for loading files from HS URLs? using f.hubpostusercontent... or the same subdomain ...

Hi Jayme, not sure if this helps but here was HubSpot has on this.
<https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/reports/why-do-HubSpot-and-google-analytics-not-match>

In the past, some issues I've seen before causing discrepancy include bot filtering and how HubSpot tracks a new session. Sometimes bots can cause a huge discrepancy in sessions if bot filtering isn't enacted in HubSpot.
Bot traffic specifically has a high bounce rate, as bots often hit just one page.
I have bot filtering on in both HubSpot settings and Google
